title: R module (and dotkit?) file needs LIBRARY_PATH and LD_LIBRARY_PATH for bioconductor installs
body:
Currently the module file setup by spack for R will not add the correct library paths which results in broken library links.

$ ldd ~/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/3.3/ncdf4/libs/ncdf4.so  | grep -i not
        libR.so => not found

If the library paths are added to the environment then ncdf4.so dynamically links correctly.
$  ldd R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/3.3/ncdf4/libs/ncdf4.so | grep libR.so
        libR.so => /gpfs/software/spack/opt/spack/linux-redhat6-x86_64/gcc-6.1.0/R-3.3.1-tpkh25pakjkfxwqth7kp3gxl4grlf6c2/rlib/R/lib/libR.so (0x00002aaaae244000)

Need to add the following to the R module file:
prepend-path --delim ":" LIBRARY_PATH "PATH_TO_R_library"
prepend-path --delim ":" LD_LIBRARY_PATH "PATH_TO_R_library"

ncdf4 was installed as a pre-req to GENESIS. https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/devel/bioc/html/GENESIS.html

I will look into this further to submit a patch as I get my user running.
